EmailTemplate.subject: Young, Professional and Employable - an exciting workshop series with Goldman Sachs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
c
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Exams are almost over and summer is just around the corner! If that isn't enough to get you excited we are incredibly pleased to officially launch our new workshop series in partnership with investment banking firm Goldman Sachs!
Check out the huge range of workshops available for you to be involved with over the next few weeks. Sign up now and learn new skills to prepare you for your future and get advice from experienced professionals working in a very competitive industry!
Workshops are taking place between 09:00 and 13:00 by Borough High Street, London.
SPACES ARE LIMITED SO CLICK HERE TO EXPRESS YOUR INTEREST NOW!
CV's, Interviews and Job Applications
Wednesday 6th of July
The job market is a very competitive environment. Learn from professionals where to find different jobs and learn about what qualities and characteristics different employers look for in their teams! You will also get individual feedback on your CV, a mock interview and a range of hints and tips from the people who might hire you in the future!
Personal Branding and Professional Image
Wednesday 13th of July
Showcasing your personality is incredibly important to make sure you stand out from the crowd and to show potential employers all the unique qualities you can bring to an organisation. This workshop focuses on identifying your strengths, how to present yourself professionally and how to sell yourself whilst highlighting your special qualities!
Customer Service and Clients
Wednesday 27th of July
Learn from professionals about what makes a good salesperson, how to adapt your style to suit different industries, and learn about the psychology around selling a product! You will also have a mock job interview and be involved in a mock assessment event for you will get individual feedback on how to improve your interviewing style!
Leadership and Problem Solving
Wednesday 3rd of August
Outstanding leadership skills are vital in when working in a team environment and when trying to get people to be involved in a particular project - whether in school or in work. Get involved and learn a range of leadership and management techniques and how to inspire and motivate a group. Finally you'll learn how to show recruiters your a leader, and why you should be hired!
Public Speaking and Presenting
Wednesday 10th of August
Public speaking is a daunting task for many - but just by learning a few techniques from the professionals you can build your confidence and learn how to grab the audiences attention! From body language to presentations this workshop covers everything you need to know!
Money Management and Budgeting
Wednesday 17th of August
Credit cards, student loans, mortgages and tax - the confusing world of savings, spending and budgeting. This workshop will give you an overview to all things money related from opening a bank account, how to manage your spending at university, and more excitingly the tips and tricks of saving money!
Taking Control of your Career
Wednesday 24th of August
Where do you see yourself in 5, 10, 20 years time? Do you know how you are going to get there? How are you going to achieve your goals? This workshop is aimed at helping you set your career targets, learn to network and build networks and how to manage your time effectively to help you achieve. You will also have a 1-2-1 coaching session with a professional from Goldman Sachs!
Finally if you have completed HeadStart you also have exclusive access to even more events delivered by Goldman Sachs which will be specifically tailored to helping you develop the skills you learnt during your HeadStart experience.
We look forward to seeing you there!
From The Challenge Society Graduate Team!
